{"id":1158756939,"question_id":3312,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1706409606,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1158756939/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Changing Keys","memory":"42 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countKeyChanges(String s) {\n        \n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length()-1; i++){\n            \n            char ch0 = s.charAt(i);\n            char ch1 = s.charAt(i+1);\n            \n            int a = getIdx(ch0);\n            int b = getIdx(ch1);\n            \n            if(a!=b) cnt++;\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        return cnt;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private int getIdx(char ch){\n        if(ch>='a' && ch<='z')\n            return ch-'a';\n        else if(ch>='A' && ch<='Z')\n            return ch-'A';\n        \n        return -1;\n            \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-changing-keys","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
